response.original_title: 嬢王夜曲2 美人キャバ嬢欲望満開ナイト
response.overview: Reona is trying to become the number one hostess and rise to stardom in the neon district, while Hazuki is working as a temporary office worker and is having an affair with her boss. Although they are best friends, they live in completely different worlds by day and night, but when a tragedy happens to Reona, Hazuki decides to get revenge and puts on a dress and jumps into the mysterious world of the night...
response.title: Queen of the Night 2: Beautiful Hostess' Desires in Full Bloom
